author: m.kalinin
content: EL requests processed as a sidecar opens up an Optimistic sync attack vector, details are in the PR description. The mitigation would be to keep request sidecar around a payload on EL side and validate requests after the payload has been executed which isn't ideal because CL may not send `newPayload` for every payload during the optimistic sync, https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/551
